title: Is my account banned?
body:
So ive recently discovered that i haven't been getting any chests and keys for my games. I know that you can get only so many chests and i don't get them that often anyway but sense ive been trying new champions and stuff i should have at least gotten a key. 
So im wondering if i was banned from getting loot?
If i am would i get a notification because i haven't seen any emails or notifications at all and its been about 2 weeks sense ive had this problem.
Plzz help, i would really appreciate it!

replies.body:
*Lew* is pretty spot-on with their assessment of the situation. For hextech chests specifically, you'll have to earn at least an S- grade for the match or be in a premade with someone who received the same or better and have not earned a chest on that champion this season. For key fragments, each drop reduces the chances of the next drop, as this droprate is more of a curve than a line. The only way to modify this droprate is to play with friends in a premade, as this *slightly increases* your drop chance.

I strongly recommend giving our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) a thorough reading if you haven't already. Let me know if you have any questions.

well i rarely get any fragments at all and even now i think i shouldve been getting them. Its also been 2 weeks sense ive stopped getting loot and wouldn't i get notified if i have chat restrictions?
im also unsure how i would've gotten one sense i don't play often and when i do its only ranked, i do have my bf play on my account sometimes cause hes getting into league

You only lose access to [Hexxtech ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463)loot if you got chat restrictions or a 2 week suspension for toxic behaiovr.  If you haven't gotten any punishments recently and aren't getting key fragments it is likely because you are at the cap (12 fragments)  This cycle resets monthly for individual accounts based on when they first got a key fragment drop.
